mapper.select:
select log_id, operate_type, operate_system, operate_module, operate_user_id, operate_user_name, operate_time, update_params, request_url, table_name, ip, operate_status from sys_operate_log
operate_type = #{operateType}

select operate_type as operateType, case operate_type when '-1' then '退出系统' when '1' then '登录系统' when '2' then '查询' when '3' then '新增' when '4' then '更新' when '5' then '删除' end as operateTypeName, count( operate_type ) as operateTypeCount from sys_operate_log where operate_time > date_sub(now(),interval 30 day) group by operate_type

select t_count.*, su.user_name as userName from ( select operate_user_id AS operateUserId, count( operate_user_id ) AS operateCount from sys_operate_log where operate_time > date_sub( now( ), interval 30 day ) group by operate_user_id ) as t_count left join sys_user su ON t_count.operateUserId = su.user_id order by t_count.operateCount desc
